text: Labor Leader Anthony Albanese has written to the Prime Minister calling for the two parties to come together and deal with the crippling drought. Anthony Albanese is requesting an emergency joint cabinet arrangement which was used during World War II. Mr Albanese is proposing a team of 15, which would include the Prime Minister, his deputy, the Drought Minister and Agriculture Minister. It is hoped the cabinet arrangement will protect the government from political backlash during a time of crisis. Image: Instagram
